      • setRewind

        public void setRewind(boolean rewind)

        Decide if player should respawn back to the location where he/she died last time.

        Parameters:
        rewind - If rewind is true, previous death location becomes the new spawnpoint.Otherwise, spawnpoint would be reset to default one.

      • setKeepInventory

        public void setKeepInventory(boolean keep,
                             boolean drop)

        Decide if player's items should be kept upon death.

        Defaults to GameModule.setKeepInventory

        Parameters:
        keep - Whether or not to keep items in inventory.
        drop - Whether or not to drop items on ground.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - is thrown if keep and drop are both true.
        See Also:
        GameModule.setKeepInventory

      • setKeepExp

        public void setKeepExp(boolean keep,
                       boolean drop)

        Decide if player's experience level should be kept upon death.

        Parameters:
        keep - Whether or not to keep experience level.
        drop - Whether or not to drop experience on ground.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - is thrown if keep and drop are both true.
